owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

activeForNumberOfBlocks().notice: Returns the duration of the program measured in number of blocks.

adoption(address).notice: Returns the number of CHICHIs that the sender has adopted.

balance().notice: Returns the current CHICHI balance for the program.

endingBlock().notice: Returns the block number when the program ends.

hasAdopted(address).notice: Indicates if the sender has adopted CHICHIs.

hasEnded().notice: Indicates if the program has ended.

hasStarted().notice: Indicates if the program has started.

numberOfAdoptions().notice: Returns the number of times people have adopted CHICHIs.

numberOfChichisToAdopt(address).notice: Returns the number of CHICHIs that can be adopted by sender.

startingBlock().notice: Returns the block number when the program starts.

transferRemainingBalanceToTreasury().notice: Transfers the remaining balance to the CHICHI Treasury.
